name: LOGAN BRANDON
short: I have been a donor sicnce high school.Although I have not been a donor every year,I always want to give to the human race.I love to help others!Moreover it give a real in my mind

name: MUSON BRANDON
short: I proudly donate blood on a regular basis because it gives others something they desperately need to survive.Just knowing I can make a difference in someone else's life makes me feel great!

name: BRANDON MUSON
short: I wish I could tell you my donor how grateful I am for your selfless act. You gave me new life. We may be coworkers or schoolmates or just two in the same community.I'm very grateful to you.
